name: Westcoup
description:
Westcoup is a young and ambitious software company located in Lviv, one of the most attractive IT cities of Ukraine. We specialize in mobile, web and desktop development. Our aim is to provide the best solutions for our clients through the proper modern technologies and creative approach.
 
Our team consists of open minded, creative and hardworking developers. The most valuable for us is to get something new from our clients and give them all the best that we can do. We are always client oriented.
 
Believe in your idea, let's do it together!
